snippet.title: Cyberdillo 3DO Gameplay [No Commentary]
snippet.description:
I have a ton of games in my backlog that I've either never played or played very little.  So I thought it might be fun to sample semi-random games and upload them so everyone can see how terrible I am at them!

So here we have a game called Cyberdillo for the 3DO.  It was developed by Pixel Technologies and published in North America by Panasonic in 1996.  I'm not really sure what to say about it other than it's really bizarre.  I had read some negative reviews about the game, but I still wanted to give it a shot.  It was worth playing just to check it out, but I don't think I'll be picking it up again anytime soon.  I captured this video on an FZ-10 3DO.

You can check out my full video game collection here:  http://www.completionator.com/Collection/Index/1
